description: Extensive Roman nucleated settlement. The central site is now destroyed and only intermittent records remain. Supposedly a 3rd CE shrine along with a cemetery.
bibliography: Martyn, Blick, Brindle, and et al. “New Fen Drove, Earith (Cambridgeshire).” The Rural Settlement of Roman Britain: an online resource, 2015. https://doi.org/10.5284/1030449.
Regan, R, C Evans, and L Webley. “The Camp Ground Excavations. Colne Fen, Earith. Assessment Report.” Cambridge Archaeological Unit Report No. 654 (2004). https://doi.org/10.5284/1021819.
